collection.name: Jissen Pachi-Slot Hisshouhou! Hokuto no Ken

name: Jissen Pachi-Slot Pachinko Hisshouhou! Wii: Hokuto no Ken - Sammy's Collection
summary: Jissen Pachi-Slot Pachinko Hisshouhou! Wii: Hokuto no Ken - Sammy's Collection is a compilation of Fist of the North Star-themed pachi-slot games for Wii.
